title: "Using Sparse Data to Predict Lab Quakes"
excerpt: "Researchers at Los Alamos National Laboratory have developed a machine learning approach that can predict fault slip in laboratory earthquakes with reliability while accounting for sparse data due to infrequent major earthquakes."
